name: ThirdPartyVehicle
title: Third Party Vehicle
description: Third Party Vehicle codes for insurance operations.

concept.display: Heavy commercial vehicle (over 4,500 kg) including taxi, limousine, ambulance, police vehicle, fire department vehicle, buses and funeral carriage.
concept.definition: A commercial vehicle exceeding 4,500 kg in weight, including specialized vehicles such as taxis, limousines, ambulances, emergency services vehicles, public transit buses, and hearses.

designation.value: Véhicule utilitaire lourd (plus de 4 500 kg) incluant taxi, limousine, ambulance, voiture de patrouille, camion d'incendie, autobus et corbillards.
Vehículo comercial pesado (más de 4,500 kg) incluyendo taxi, limusina, ambulancia, vehículo policial, vehículo de bomberos, autobuses y carroza fúnebre.

concept.display: Light commercial vehicle (4,500 kg or less, such as light truck, pick up, van) except those described in C above.
concept.definition: A commercial vehicle weighing 4,500 kg or less, such as pickup trucks, vans, and light-duty trucks, excluding the heavy commercial vehicles and specialized vehicles listed above.

designation.value: Véhicule utilitaire léger (4 500 kg ou moins, tels que véhicule léger, fourgonnette, camionnette) à l'exception de ceux décrits ci-dessus.
Vehículo comercial ligero (4,500 kg o menos, como camioneta ligera, pick up, camioneta) excepto los descritos arriba.

concept.display: Recreational type vehicle (e.g. snowmobile, motorcycle, motorized bicycle and all-terrain vehicle).
concept.definition: A motorized vehicle designed primarily for recreational use, including snowmobiles, motorcycles, motorized bicycles, and all-terrain vehicles.

designation.value: Véhicule de type récréatif (par exemple, motoneige, motocyclette, bicyclette électrique et véhicule tout-terrain).
Vehículo de tipo recreativo (por ejemplo, moto de nieve, motocicleta, bicicleta motorizada y vehículo todoterreno).

concept.display: Temporary code indicating that a search is under way to obtain the type of third party vehicle.
concept.definition: A temporary placeholder code used when the type of the third-party vehicle involved in an incident has not yet been determined and is being investigated.

designation.value: Code temporaire indiquant qu'une recherche est en cours pour obtenir le type de véhicule tiers.
Código temporal que indica que se está realizando una búsqueda para obtener el tipo de vehículo de terceros.

concept.display: Private passenger vehicle, except those described in C above.
concept.definition: A privately owned vehicle used primarily for personal transportation, excluding heavy commercial vehicles and specialized vehicles.

designation.value: Voiture de tourisme, sauf celle décrite ci-dessus.
Vehículo de pasajeros privado, excepto los descritos arriba.

concept.display: No other vehicle involved or hit-and-run vehicle.
concept.definition: Indicates either that no other vehicle was involved in the incident, or that another vehicle was involved but fled the scene before being identified.

designation.value: Aucun autre véhicule impliqué ou en délit de fuite.
Ningún otro vehículo involucrado o vehículo que se dio a la fuga.

concept.definition: A non-motorized vehicle designed to be towed by another vehicle, including utility trailers, semi-trailers, and travel trailers.
